name: modular-ui-dev
description: A tool for dynamic, component-based page-generation.

scripts.build: webpack dev/modular.js && webpack dev/modular.js --dev && webpack dev/modular.js --min && webpack dev/modular.js --dev --min
scripts.publish: cd ../dist && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Jonas Karg
__old_build__: npm version patch && webpack dev/modular.js && webpack dev/modular.js --dev && webpack dev/modular.js --min && webpack dev/modular.js --dev --min
